Text:
what is this supposed to be?
5 inch floppy???
i dont even think i can remember the last time i saw a floppy disk

5 inch Floppy is a 5-10 minute video game review show native to Telstra Bigpond's gaming website, GameArena. It aims to tackle one core game per week, analysing & criticising it at a high level, and obtaining a deep level of understanding of the game's dynamics.

All episodes are hosted on GameArena's video page:
http://www.gamearena.com.au/videos/browse.php/9/
You can either stream the show or download it in 720p quality.
